intro: Calth High Guard (CCLVth CoH) follow the Ultramar Pattern Doctrine, with an emphasis on large infantry formations. Its armies gain 13 formation points (F/p), 14 upgrade points (U/p), 4 Titan points (T/p), and 5 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle. A negative U/p value means that you gain that many upgrade points for taking a particular formation.
strategy: Solar Auxilia armies have a Strategy Rating of 2.
Initiative: Legiones Astartes Allied Detachments and Collegia Titanica Allied Banners have an Initiative Rating of 1+. Calth High Guard Sections have an Initiative Rating of 2+, and are subject to the 'Army of Mankind' special rule. Legio Cybernetica Maniples have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Cybernetica Cortex' special rule. Questoris Familia Lances have an Initiative Rating of 2+ and are subject to the 'Chivalry' special rule. The 'And They Shall Know No Fear' special rule applies to all Legiones Astartes Allied Detachments.
specialRules: And They Shall Know No Fear

sections.name: Calth High Guard Core Sections
sections.description: May not have more Malcador Companies or Light Sentinel Patrols than Command Tercios and Lasrifle Tercios

formations.name: 1 Section Command Tercio
formations.units: One Auxilia Legate Marshal character in an Auxilia Command Squad, four Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, and one Auxilia Flamer Squad
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, one Charonite Ogryns, or two Cyclops of any single configuration (1 U/p), or add one Malcador of any configuration, four Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, or add three Termite Assault Drills (2 U/p)

formations.name: 1+ Auxilia Lasrifle Tercio

formations.name: Auxilia Malcador Company

formations.name: Auxilia Light Sentinel Patrol

extraUnits: Add two Cyclops of any single configuration: 1 U/p
